QwtDialSimpleNeedle Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A needle for dial widgets.

The following colors are used:

  • QColorGroup::Mid
    Pointer
  • QColorGroup::base
    Knob

See also:
QwtDial, QwtCompass
